Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed].

Requirements You have a fully grown tail.

You can shed a portion of your tail to escape. You cease being grabbed, then Stride without triggering any reactions from the creature that grabbed you. It takes 1 day for your tail to fully grow back. Until it does, you can't use your tail unarmed attack, and you take a â€“2 circumstance penalty on checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Balance].
